text: Madrid Carnival (Spanish:Verbena) is a 1941 Spanish semi-documentary drama film directed by Edgar Neville.Bentley p.86 ==Cast== * Maruja Tomás * Amalia de Isaura * Miguel Pozanco * Manuel Dicenta * José Martín * Manolo Morán * Ana María Quijada * Miguel Utrillo * Juan Monfort * José María Lado == References == ==Bibliography== * Bentley, Bernard. A Companion to Spanish Cinema. title: Madrid Carnival
